body: the most realistic doujin ever made

@Pentagram Industries I'm pretty sure they are some old friends, now fuck-buddies (?). Since the girl once said she broke up with her boyfriend. And then again on page 19, which also gives us enough knowledge as to what exactly they are to each other.

@m-nepgear Well, whilst their relationship is nothing like between the two in the certain anime, I guess what does remind you is the casual portrayal of their everyday life. It isn't really any especially interesting, rather it's the kind that "soothes your soul". (Or makes you die of jealousy LMAO) Anyways, it's sad there aren't that much anime like that, and the one you mentioned is actually the only one I'm familiar with. And then again, even that one isn't well-known at all. Truly, I wish there were more slice-of-life anime doing this, rather than having "out-of-the world" premises and adding some twists and turns along the way just to "keep things interesting". But I guess the anime industry is too stale for even allowing something like that. And in turn, very rarely do people try making material of the kind.
Been dying for a translation for a while now. Maybe it's only a little under 30 pages/a week, but it's still very much well worth it.
